homeScreenTemplate:
<script>
  try {
    MyCampusApp.rootScope.mobileAppName = "La Salle University";
    MyCampusApp.rootScope.statusBarColor = "#071631";
    StatusBar.backgroundColorByHexString(MyCampusApp.rootScope.statusBarColor);
    StatusBar.overlaysWebView(false);
    window.screen.orientation.lock('portrait');

    /* if (window.device) {
    $scope.devicename = window.device.name;
    $scope.deviceplatform = window.device.platform;
    $scope.deviceversion = window.device.version;
    $scope.devicemodel = window.device.model.replace(/,/g, '.');
    alert($scope.devicename + "   ===" + $scope.deviceplatform + "==" + $scope.deviceversion + "===" + $scope.devicemodel);
     }*/

    function exitApp() {
      navigator.app.exitApp();
    }

    try {


      function successAuth(data) {
        if (!data) {
          $.unblockUI();
          if (window.device) {
            navigator.notification.alert(
              'Some error occurred. Please try again', // message
              null, // callback
              'Error', // title
              'OK' // buttonName
            );
          } else {
            alert('Some error occurred. Please try again')
          }
          navigator.app.exitApp();
          return;
        }

        MyCampusApp.rootScope.user['accessToken'] = data.access_token;
        MyCampusApp.rootScope.user['refreshToken'] = data.refresh_token;
        MyCampusApp.rootScope.user['providerData'] = data.access_token;
        MyCampusApp.rootScope.erpticket = {};
        MyCampusApp.rootScope.erpticket[$.jStorage.get('tenantInfo').erp.name] = data.access_token;
        MyCampusApp.rootScope.loggedIn = true;

        /* User info for logging into ERP/LMS */
        var subVal = $.jStorage.get("userSub")
        MyCampusApp.rootScope.username = "";
        if (subVal) {
          var userSplit = subVal.split('/');
          MyCampusApp.rootScope.username = (userSplit.length == 1) ? userSplit[0].split('@')[0] : userSplit[1].split('@')[0];
          console.log("user sub= " + MyCampusApp.rootScope.username);
        }
        MyCampusApp.rootScope.password = $.jStorage.get("unifyedpassword");

        MyCampusApp.rootScope.isUserTenantAdmin = MyCampusApp.rootScope.user.admins.indexOf(MyCampusApp.rootScope.user['email']) !== -1;

        /*if ($.jStorage.get('setSecurityQuestion') === true){
            window.location.href = '#/app/SignIn279/SignIn279Page2';
        }else {
            window.location.href = '#/app/Settings2/Settings2Page9';
        }*/
        window.location.href = '#/app/Menu82/Menu82';
      }

      function failureAuth(err) {
        $.unblockUI();
        MyCampusApp.rootScope.loggedIn = false;
        if (window.device) {
          navigator.notification.alert("Unable to login, please check your credentials", exitApp, '', 'Ok');
        } else {
          alert("Unable to login, please check your credentials");
        }
      }

      var redirectUser = function() {
          /* Check if the user is logged in */
          console.log('redirectUser');
          if (MyCampusApp.rootScope.loggedIn) {
            window.location.href = '#/app/Menu82/Menu82'; /* Redirect user to home page */
            return;
          }
          if ($.jStorage.get("unifyedusername") && $.jStorage.get("unifyedpassword")) {
            MyCampusApp.rootScope.user = $.jStorage.get('user');
            MyCampusApp.rootScope.GatewayUrl = 'https://' + MyCampusApp.rootScope.user['domain'] + MyCampusApp.rootScope.user['gatewaypath'];

            var settings = {
              "async": true,
              "crossDomain": true,
              "url": MyCampusApp.rootScope.GatewayUrl + "/unifydidentity/open/oauth2/token",
              "method": "POST",
              "headers": {
                "Content-Type": "application/x-www-form-urlencoded",
                "X-TENANT-ID": MyCampusApp.rootScope.user.tenant,
                "X-TENANT-DOMAIN": MyCampusApp.rootScope.user.idpTenantDomain,
              },
              "data": {
                "username": $.jStorage.get("unifyedusername"),
                "password": $.jStorage.get("unifyedpassword")
              }
            }

            $.ajax(settings).done(successAuth).fail(failureAuth);

          } else {

            MyCampusApp.rootScope.loggedIn = false;
            /* Check if app has only guest applets */
            if ($.jStorage.get('tenantInfo').guestApp) {
              MyCampusApp.rootScope.user = null;
              window.location.href = '#/app/Menu82/Menu82'; /* Redirect user to home page */
            } else {
              window.location.href = '#/app/SignIn279/SignIn279'; /* Redirect user to signin page since it doesn't have guest applets */
            }
          }
        }
        //  alert("Stand alone : " + MyCampusApp.rootScope.standaloneApp);
        /* Check if the app is running as standalone app */
      if (MyCampusApp.rootScope.standaloneApp) {
        /* Get insititution details from tenant Id */
        var settings = {
          "async": true,
          "crossDomain": true,
          "method": "GET",
          "headers": {
            "content-type": "application/json",
            "x-tenant-id": "123123"
          }
        };

        MyCampusApp.rootScope.environment = "prod";

        switch (MyCampusApp.rootScope.environment) {
          case 'dev':
            {
              settings['url'] = 'https://seark.unifyed.com/unifyd-gateway/api/unifydplatform/open/school?school=' + MyCampusApp.config.tenant;
              break;
            }
          case 'stage':
            {
              settings['url'] = 'https://unifyed-staging.unifyed.com/unifyd-gateway-preprod/api/unifydplatform/open/school?school=' + MyCampusApp.config.tenant;
              break;
            }
          case 'prod':
            {
              settings['url'] = 'https://api.unifyed.com/unifyd-gateway/api/unifydplatform/open/school?school=' + MyCampusApp.config.tenant;
              break;
            }
        }

        try {
          /* AK - Avoiding the call to get school info and hardcoding here..*/
          /* This is the response from https:unifyed-staging.unifyed.com/unifyd-gateway-preprod/api/unifydplatform/open/school?school=Unifyedpreprod */

          var tenantinfoStage = {
            "id": "5c40983cbb0e070001ab7c12",
            "name": "La Salle University",
            "logoUrl": "https://my.lasalle.edu/mylasalle/images/lasalle-2x.png",
            "tenantId": "lasalle",
            "appId": "7130",
            "guestApp": true,
            "erp": {
              "name": "Banner",
              "sso": true,
              "useSessionUser": false
            },
            "lms": null
          };
          $.jStorage.set('tenantInfo', tenantinfoStage);
          redirectUser();

          /*$.blockUI();
          $.ajax(settings).done(function(response) {
            $.unblockUI();
            $.jStorage.set('tenantInfo', response.content[0]);
            redirectUser();
          });*/
        } catch (e) {
          $.unblockUI();
          if (window.device) {
            navigator.notification.alert('Something went wrong, please try after sometime.', exitApp, '', 'Ok');
          } else {
            alert('Something went wrong, please try after sometime.');
          }
        }
      } else {
        alert("Going to else");
        redirectUser();
      }

      var handleSwitch = function(btn) {
        if (btn == 1) {
          window.location.href = '#/amakerhome';
        }
      }
      var switchApp = function() {
        if (window.device) {
          navigator.notification.confirm("Do you want to switch app?", handleSwitch, 'Switch App', ['Yes', 'No']);
        }
      }

      var backEventAttached = backEventAttached ? backEventAttached : false;

      if (!backEventAttached) {
        var onBackKeyDown = function(event) {

          // alert(window.location.hash);
          var loc = window.location;
          if (loc.hash == "#/app/Menu82/Menu82") {
            exitApp();
          } else if (loc.hash == "#/app/Settings2/Settings2") {
            window.location.href = '#/app/Menu82/Menu82';
          } else if (loc.hash == "#/app/SignIn279/SignIn279") {
            window.location.href = '#/app/Menu82/Menu82';
          } else if (loc.hash == "#/app/SignIn279/SignIn279" && !$.jStorage.get('tenantInfo').guestApp && MyCampusApp.rootScope.standaloneApp) {
            exitApp();
          } else if (loc.hash == "#/app/SignIn279/SignIn279" && !$.jStorage.get('tenantInfo').guestApp && !MyCampusApp.rootScope.standaloneApp) {
            switchApp();
          } else {
            navigator.app.backHistory();
          }

        }
      }

      if (!backEventAttached) {
        document.addEventListener("backbutton", onBackKeyDown, true);
        backEventAttached = true;
      }

      var Notification = PushNotification.init({
        android: {
          senderID: "1012473507211"
        },
        browser: {
          pushServiceURL: 'http://push.api.phonegap.com/v1/push'
        },
        ios: {
          alert: "true",
          badge: "true",
          sound: "true"
        },
        windows: {}
      });

      Notification.on('registration', function(data) {

        var devicePushID = data.registrationId;
      });

      MyCampusApp.rootScope.inAppNotificationHandler(Notification);
    } catch (e) {}

    $('input:text').focusout(function() {
      $("#footerContentContainer").addClass('footerGroupIcons').removeClass('hideFooter');
      $("#bottomPoweredBy").removeClass('hideFooter');

    });

    $('input:text').focusin(function() {

      $("#footerContentContainer").addClass('hideFooter').removeClass('footerGroupIcons');
      $("#bottomPoweredBy").addClass('hideFooter');
    });
  } catch (ex) {
    //alert(ex);
  }
</script>

<div class="message_main">
  <div class="list-group-item toolbar-menu clearfix" ng-show="automatedAlerts">
    <div id="tab1" tabindex="0" aria-label="Manual Tab" class="col-xs-6 col-sm-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6 toolbar-column toolbar-column-active borderNone focusTranspatent" ng-click="selectTab('tab1')">
      <span class="proximaFont">Manual</span>
    </div>
    <div id="tab2" tabindex="0" aria-label="Automated Tab" class="focusTranspatent col-xs-6 col-sm-6 col-lg-6 col-md-4 toolbar-column " ng-click="selectTab('tab2')">
      <span class="proximaFont">Automated</span>
    </div>
  </div>
  <div ng-show="selTab == 1">
    <div class="proximaFont sm_webAppletContentPadding bottomPaddingMobile ng-scope">
      <div ng-show="messagingList.length!==0 || searchCase" class="">
        <div class="borderRadiusTopWeb  marginBottom15px">
          <div class="colPadding" ng-class="studioParam == undefined?'col-lg-3 col-md-3 col-sm-4 col-xs-6':studioParam == 4?'col-xs-6':studioParam == 8?'col-xs-6':studioParam == 6?'col-xs-6':'col-lg-3'">
            <div class="focusTranspatent dropdown dropdownMenuSelect focusTranspatent" tabindex="0" aria-label="All message dropdown">
              <button class="btn btn-default dropdown-toggle greytext  backgroundTransparent" type="button" id="dropdownMenuButton" data-toggle="dropdown" aria-haspopup="true" aria-expanded="false">
                <span>{{dropDownMessage}}</span>
                <span class="fa fa-angle-down pull-right"></span>
              </button>
              <ul class="dropdown-menu multiCheckPadding" aria-labelledby="dropdownMenuButton">
                <span class="dropChannel">Channel</span></li>
                <li class="list-group-item colPadding borderNone ng-scope clearfix" ng-repeat="channel in channels" ng-if="channel.enable == true">
                  <a class="customPadding cursorPointer dropItemsColor">
                    <div class="control-group">
                      <label class="control control--checkbox fontSize12" ng-click="isChannelSelected(channel,$event)">
                        {{channel.channel}}
                        <input type="checkbox" ng-checked="selChannels.indexOf(channel.channelId) != -1" />
                        <div class="control__indicator"></div>
                      </label>
                    </div>
                  </a>
                </li>
                <li class="list-group-item colPadding borderNone paddingTB10 clearfix"><span class="dropChannel">Status</span></li>
                <li class="list-group-item colPadding borderNone clearfix">
                  <a class="customPadding cursorPointer dropItemsColor">
                    <div class="control-group">
                      <label class="control control--checkbox fontSize12" ng-click="isStatusSelected('Sent',$event)">
                        Sent
                        <input type="checkbox" ng-checked="selStatus.indexOf('Sent') != -1" />
                        <div class="control__indicator"></div>
                      </label>
                    </div>
                  </a>
                </li>
                <li clas="list-group-item colPadding borderNone clearfix">
                  <a class="customPadding cursorPointer dropItemsColor">
                    <div class="control-group">
                      <label class="control control--checkbox fontSize12" ng-click="isStatusSelected('Scheduled',$event)">
                        Scheduled
                        <input type="checkbox" ng-checked="selStatus.indexOf('Scheduled') != -1" />
                        <div class="control__indicator"></div>
                      </label>
                    </div>
                  </a>
                </li>
              </ul>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="verticalAlignMiddle colPadding text-right pull-right" ng-if="$root.webApp" ng-class="studioParam == undefined?'col-sm-6 col-xs-6 ':studioParam == 4?'col-xs-6':studioParam == 8?'col-xs-6':studioParam == 6?'col-xs-6':'col-lg-6'">
            <button class="btn btn-small btn-primary focusTranspatent" ng-if="createPermission" ng-click="gotonext()" aria-label="Create Message">+ Create</button>
          </div>
          <div class="verticalAlignMiddle colPadding text-right pull-right col-sm-6 col-xs-6" ng-if="!$root.webApp">
            <button class="btn btn-small btn-primary focusTranspatent" ng-click="gotonext()" aria-label="Create Message">+ Create <span class="hide480px"> Message </span></button>
          </div>
          <div class="clearfix"></div>
        </div>
        <div style="clear:both;"></div>
        <div ng-show="selTab == 1" class="ng-show">
          <div class="focusTranspatent list-group-item borderRadius4px clearfix marginBottom15px word-wrap ng-scope" ng-repeat="m in messagingList" tabindex="0" aria-label="message box">
            <div class="font16 font-weight600 marginBottom15px">
              <div class="fontSize16 lineheight22 messagingList" ng-bind-html=trusthtml(m.shortMessage)></div>
            </div>
            <div class="font12 colorDarkGrey marginBottom15px">
              <div class="messageStatus focusTranspatent" style="vertical-align: middle;" tabindex="0" aria-label="Message Status {{m.messageTitle}}">
                <span ng-if="m.messageStatus == 'Sent'"><img src="images/sendSuccess.png" alt="success icon" class="iconWidth16px">{{m.messageTitle}}</span>
                <span ng-if="m.messageStatus != 'Sent'"><img src="images/time.png" alt="time icon" class="iconWidth16px"> {{m.messageTitle}}</span>
              </div>
              <div class="messageStatus focusTranspatent" tabindex="0" aria-label="Message Created by{{m.createdBy}}">By - {{m.createdBy}}</div>
              <a href class="messageStatus" ng-class="!deletePermission ? 'disable':''" ng-click="deleteMessage(m,$event,$index);" aria-label="trash icon"><i class="fa fa-trash-o fontSize18 themeAccentColor cursorPointer"></i></a>
              <a href class="messageStatus" ng-class="!updatePermission ? 'disable':''" ng-if="m.messageStatus != 'Sent'" ng-click="editScheduleMess(m,$event,index);" aria-label="edit icon"><i class="fa fa-pencil fontSize18 themeAccentColor cursorPointer"></i></a>
            </div>
            <div class="font14 colorLigherGrey">
              <ul class="selectedChannel">
                <li class="focusTranspatent userPreferances btn-primary-bordered boxradius font12" tabindex="0" aria-label="{{getChannelDesc(chl)}} button" ng-repeat="chl in m.channels" ng-click="messageDetail(m,chl)" data-toggle="modal" data-target="#channelPreview">
                  <span>{{getChannelDesc(chl)}}</span>
                </li>
              </ul>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class=" text-center col-lg-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-xs-12 paddingTop25px  displayTable" ng-show="messagingList.length > 0 ">
            <div class="col-lg-2 col-sm-2 col-md-2 displayTableCell verticalAlignMiddle  colPadding  fullWidth">
              <button class="btn btn-small btn-primary focusTranspatent" ng-hide="last" ng-click="loadPage(page)" aria-label="Load More">Load More</button>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
        <div ng-show="selTab == 2" class="">
          <div class="list-group-item borderRadius4px clearfix marginBottom15px" ng-repeat="m in messagingList" tabindex="0" data-toggle="modal" data-target="#channelPreview" style="cursor: pointer">
            <div class="font18 font-weight600 marginBottom15px">
              {{m.shortMessage}}
            </div>
            <div class="font14 colorDarkGrey marginBottom15px TopPadding">
              <div class="messageStatus" style="vertical-align: middle;">
                <span class="font12"><img src="images/sendSuccess.png" alt="send Success" class="iconWidth20px"> Sent</span> <span class="font12"><img src="images/statics.png" alt="statics icon" class="iconWidth20px"> Statistics</span> <span class="font12"><img src="images/gallery.png" alt="gallery icon" class="iconWidth20px">  image</span>
              </div>
              <div class="sendername focusTranspatent" tabindex="0" aria-label="Message Created By {{m.createdBy}}">{{m.createdBy}}</div>
            </div>
            <div class="font14 colorLigherGrey">
              <ul class="selectedChannel">
                <li class="userPreferances channeldisabled font12">Connect Post</li>
                <li class="userPreferances channeldisabled font12">notification</li>
                <li class="userPreferances channeldisabled font12">Email</li>
                <li class="userPreferances channeldisabled font12">sms</li>
              </ul>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="text-center col-lg-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-xs-12 paddingTop25px  displayTable">
            <div class="col-lg-2 col-sm-2 col-md-2 displayTableCell verticalAlignMiddle alignright colPadding textcenter fullWidth">
              <button class="btn btn-small btn-primary" ng-click="loadPage(page)" aria-label="Load More">Load More</button>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
      <div id="noMessage" ng-show="messagingList.length===0 && setMess === 1" class="textcenter ng-hide">
        <br>
        <br>
        <img src="images/messaging.png" alt="messaging icon">
        <br>
        <br>
        <span class="fontBold fontSize16">No Message Available</span>
        <br>
        <br>
        <span class="fontSize14 fontBold" ng-show="!searchCase">You haven't created any messages yet.</span>
        <br>
        <br>
        <div style="clear:both;"></div>
        <div class="borderRadiusTopWeb col-lg-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-xs-12 text-center displayTable" ng-show="!searchCase">
          <div class="float-none displayTableCell  verticalAlignMiddle" ng-if="createPermission">
            <button class="btn btn-small btn-primary focusTranspatent" ng-click="gotonext()" aria-label="Create Message">+ Create</button>
          </div>
          <br>
          <br>
        </div>
      </div>
      <div style="clear:both;"></div>
    </div>
    <div id="channelPreview" class="modal fade" role="dialog" ng-if="messageData">
      <!-- Preview Section Starts -->
      <div class="publish">

                      <div class="appletHeader displayTable fullWidth lightBorder">

                          </label>

                          </div>

                            <span class="cursorPointer" ng-click="saveContent('sms')"><img
                                src="images/tick.png" alt="tick icon" /> <span class="smallSizeDisplay">Save</span></span>   <span class="cursorPointer" ng-click="cancelContent('sms')"><img
                                src="images/cross.png" alt="cross icon" /> <span class="smallSizeDisplay">Cancel</span></span>
                          </div>

                      <div class="appletContent inAppNotification aligncenter">
                        <div class="inputContainer AddPaddingMobile alignleft ng-hide">

                          <img src="images/whiteIphone.png" alt="white iphone icon" />

                  <div id="emailCarousel" class="item previewItem" ng-class="messageData.channels.indexOf('email') !== -1?selChannel=='email'?'active messagePreview':'messagePreview':'hideFooter'" ng-if="messageData.channels.indexOf('email') !== -1">

                      <div class="appletHeader displayTable fullWidth lightBorder">

                            <span class="cursorPointer" ng-click="saveContent('email')"><img

                                src="images/cross.png" alt="cross icon" /> <span class="smallSizeDisplay">Cancel</span></span>
                          </div>
                           
                        </div>

                      </div>

                        <div class="list-group-item borderNone no-side-padding">

  <div ng-show="selTab == 2">

        <div id="noAutoMessage" ng-show="schedulersLength" class="textcenter" tabindex="0" aria-label="No Message Available">

          <br>
          <br>
          <span class="fontBold fontSize16">No Message Available</span>

          <br>
          <span class="fontSize14 fontBold">You haven't created any automated messages yet.</span>
          <br>
          <br>
          <div style="clear:both;"></div>
          <div class="borderRadiusTopWeb col-lg-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-xs-12 text-center displayTable ng-hide">

              <div class="btn btn-small btn-primary" ng-click="gotonext()">+ Create Automated Message</div>
            </div>
            <br>
            <br>
          </div>
        </div>
        <div ng-show="schedulers.length > 0">
          <div class="list-group-item borderRadius4px text-center marginBottom15px clearfix">

              <img src="images/time.png" alt="time icon" class="iconWidth16px">   To activate Automated message please have App and database configuration updated. See bottom of screens for configuration!
            </div>
            <div class="btn btn-small btn-default btn-primary-bordered" ng-click="showDbConfig()">
              Database Configuration  
              <img ng-if="smDbConfig.configName" src="images/checked.png" alt="checked icon" class="iconWidth16px">
              <img ng-if="!smDbConfig.configName" src="images/incomplete-alert.png" alt="incomplete alert icon" class="iconWidth16px">
            </div>
            <div class="btn btn-small btn-default btn-primary-bordered margin10px" ng-click="showAppConfig()">
              App Configuration  
              <img ng-if="smAppConfig.configName" src="images/checked.png" alt="checked icon" class="iconWidth16px">
              <img ng-if="!smAppConfig.configName" src="images/incomplete-alert.png" alt="incomplete alert icon" class="iconWidth16px">
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="list-group-item borderRadius4px clearfix marginBottom15px ng-scope" ng-repeat="sch in schedulers">
            <div class="row">
              <div class="col-xs-9">
                <div class="font16 font-weight600 marginBottom15px">
                  {{sch.schedulerName}}
                </div>
              </div>
              <div class="col-xs-3 pl-0">
                <div class="backgroundGrey">
                  <div class="pull-right padding2px10px">
                    <label ng-class="sch.running?'green-background':'grey-background'" class="switch switchCircle colPadding">
                      <input type="checkbox" ng-model="sch.running" ng-change="toggleScheduler(sch)" />
                      <div class="slider sliderCircle round"></div>
                    </label>
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div class="font12 colorDarkGrey marginBottom15px">
              <div class="messageStatus"><img src="images/time.png" alt="time icon" class="iconWidth16px"> {{sch.messageTitle}}</div>
            </div>
            <div class="font14 colorDarkGrey">
              <ul class="selectedChannel">
                <li class="userPreferances btn-primary-bordered boxradius font12" ng-repeat="chl in sch.channels">
                  <span>{{getChannelDesc(chl)}}</span>
                </li>
              </ul>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div ng-show="smpage == 'dbconfig'">
      <div class="col-lg-7 col-sm-12 col-md-7 col-xs-12 float-none marginAuto paddingMobile">
        <div class="col-lg-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 float-none marginBottom15px paddingNone verticalAlignMiddle clearfix">
          <a href class="backButton cursorPointer" ng-click="gotoDbConfigHome()" ng-if="$root.webApp" tabindex="0" aria-label="back button">
            <span class="fa fa-angle-left"></span>  Back
          </a>
        </div>
        <div class="font18 fontBold paddingBottom15px">Database Configuration</div>
        <form ng-submit="dbConfigSave()">
          <div class="colPadding borderRadius4px clearfix marginBottom10px">
            <div class="form-group">
              <label class="control-label">ERP*</label>
              <div class="dropdown dropdownMenuSelect">
                <div class="btn btn-default border1px dropdown-toggle dropdownMenuLink" type="button" data-toggle="dropdown">
                  <span>{{smDbConfig.erp}}</span>
                  <span class="fa fa-angle-down pull-right"></span>
                </div>
                <ul class="dropdown-menu fixedDropdown" aria-label="dropdownMenu">
                  <li class="list-group-item colPadding borderNone">
                    <a ng-click="erpselect()">
                      <div class="customPadding cursorPointer dropItemsColor">Banner</div>
                    </a>
                  </li>
                </ul>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="colPadding borderRadius4px clearfix marginBottom10px">
            <div class="form-group">
              <label for="configName" class="control-label">Config Name*</label>
              <input type="text" class="form-control input-sm" placeholder="Give Name" aria-label="Config Name" name="configName" id="configName" ng-model="smDbConfig.configName" required/>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="colPadding borderRadius4px clearfix marginBottom10px">
            <div class="form-group">
              <label for="driverClassname" class="control-label">Driver classname*</label>
              <input type="text" class="form-control input-sm" placeholder="Driver Classname" aria-label="Driver Classname" name="driverClassname" id="driverClassname" ng-model="smDbConfig.driverClassname" required/>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="colPadding borderRadius4px clearfix marginBottom10px">
            <div class="form-group">
              <label for="url" class="control-label">Url*</label>
              <input type="text" class="form-control input-sm" placeholder="Paste url" aria-label="add URL" name="url" id="url" ng-model="smDbConfig.url" required/>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="colPadding borderRadius4px clearfix marginBottom10px">
            <div class="form-group">
              <label for="username" class="control-label">Username*</label>
              <input type="text" class="form-control input-sm" aria-label="Username" placeholder="Username" name="username" id="username" ng-model="smDbConfig.username" required/>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="colPadding borderRadius4px clearfix marginBottom10px">
            <div class="form-group">
              <label for="password" class="control-label">Password*</label>
              <input type="password" class="form-control input-sm" aria-label="Password" placeholder="Password" name="password" id="password" ng-model="smDbConfig.password" required/>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="colPadding borderRadius4px clearfix marginBottom10px text-center">
            <!--<div class="btn btn-block btn-primary" ng-click="dbConfigSave()">Save and Validate</div>-->
            <input type="submit" id="dbsubmit" aria-label="submit" value="Save and Validate" class="btn btn-primary" />
          </div>
        </form>
      </div>
    </div>

            <span class="fa fa-angle-left"></span>  Back
          </div>

            </div>

            <div class="form-group">

            </div>

pages.pageprocessor: function pageprocessorUniversityPolicyRegister(pagedef, $scope, $routeParams, $compile, $http, $rootScope, $sce, $window, $location) {var data1 = $compile($(pagedef.datatemplate))($scope);$("#appContent").append(data1);}
pages.datatemplate:
The University Policy Register is a compilation of official La Salle University policies. This Policy Register is an ongoing project that will be updated through the periodic addition, modification, and termination of policies. Throughout this ongoing project the University reserves the right in its sole discretion to recognize and enforce policies not yet listed on this University Policy Register.

In addition to a listing of official University policies, each drop-down section below contains a link to guidelines and administrative resources/procedures pertinent to each subject area. While not official University policies, these guidelines and administrative resources/procedures contain useful information that various departments may, at their discretion, rely on and enforce in the day to day operation of the University. To the extent that a conflict exists between an official University policy and any item listed among the various guidelines and administrative resources/procedures, the substance of the official University policy shall prevail.

pages.datatemplate:
Reflective Thinking, Critical Analysis, and Problem Solving

Exercise sound reasoning to analyze issues, make decisions, and overcome problems. The individual is able to obtain, interpret, and use knowledge, facts, and data in this process, and may demonstrate originality and inventiveness. Examine how your personal, professional, religious, or spiritual values inform your worldviews.

apps.description: Explore U - Professionalism and Work Ethic

pages.datatemplate:
Professionalism and Work Ethic

Demonstrate personal accountability and effective work habits, e.g., punctuality, working productively with others, and time workload management, and understand the impact of non-verbal communication on professional work image. The individual demonstrates integrity and ethical behavior, acts responsibly with the interests of the larger community in mind, and is able to learn from his/her mistakes.

pages.datatemplate:
Digital Technology and Information Literacy

Leverage existing digital technologies ethically and efficiently to solve problems, complete tasks, and accomplish your goals; effectively demonstrate adaptability to new and emerging technologies. Identify credible and accurate information online and in the world around you.

pages.datatemplate:
Global and Diverse Perspectives

Value, respect, and learn from diverse cultures, races, ages, genders, sexual orientations, and religions. Apply knowledge of diverse contemporary and historical perspectives to challenges within your disciplines.

pages.datatemplate:
Oral and Written Communication

Articulate thoughts and ideas clearly and effectively in written and oral forms to persons inside and outside of the organization. The individual has public speaking skills; is able to express ideas to others; and can write/edit memos, letters, and complex technical reports clearly and effectively.

pages.pageprocessor: function pageprocessorExploreULeadershipCollaborativeEngagement(pagedef, $scope, $routeParams, $compile, $http, $rootScope, $sce, $window, $location) {var data1 = $compile($(pagedef.datatemplate))($scope);$("#appContent").append(data1);}
pages.datatemplate:
Leadership & Collaborative Engagement

Leverage the strengths of others to achieve common goals, and use your interpersonal skills to coach and develop others. Assess and manage your emotions and those of others; use empathetic skills to guide and motivate; and organize, prioritize, and delegate work. Build collaborative relationships with colleagues and customers representing diverse cultures, races, ages, genders, religions, lifestyles, and viewpoints. Work within a team structure and negotiate and manage conflict.

pages.datatemplate:
Career Management

Identify and articulate your skills, strengths, knowledge, and experiences relevant to the position desired and career goals, and identify areas necessary for professional growth. Navigate and explore job options, understand and take the steps necessary to pursue opportunities, and understand how to self-advocate for opportunities in the workplace.
